Package ohos.interwork.utils

Interface ParcelableEx

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElementNameEx, IntentAgentEx, PacMapEx, RemoteViewEx

    public interface ParcelableEx
    Provides an interface for data marshalling across platforms. If your application running in HarmonyOS needs to transmit a marshallable object with a process running in another platform, you need to implement the marshallingEx(ohos.utils.Parcel) method to marshal data into the Class name+data format.

    Sample code: 

     
 public class Example implements ParcelableEx {
     private int data = 0;

     @override
     public void marshallingEx(Parcel out) {
         out.writeString(getClass().getName());
         out.writeInt(data);
         return;
     }
 }
    Since:
    3

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void marshallingEx​(Parcel out)
      Writes a ParcelableEx object into a Parcel.
      default void unmarshallingEx​(Parcel in)
      Unmarshalls this ParcelableEx object from a Parcel.

    • Method Detail

      • marshallingEx

        void marshallingEx​(Parcel out)
            throws ParcelException
        Writes a ParcelableEx object into a Parcel.
        Parameters:
        out - Indicates the Parcel object to which the ParcelableEx object will be written.
        Throws:
        ParcelException - Throws this exception if the operation fails.
        Since:
        3

      • unmarshallingEx

        default void unmarshallingEx​(Parcel in)
                      throws ParcelException
        Unmarshalls this ParcelableEx object from a Parcel.

        To achieve successful data unmarshalling, you must provide a no-argument constructor for the class that inherits the ParcelableEx interface and write the class name to Parcel in the marshallingEx(ohos.utils.Parcel) method.

        Parameters:
        in - Indicates the Parcel object from which the ParcelableEx object will be unmarshaled.
        Throws:
        ParcelException - Throws this exception if the operation fails.
        Since:
        3
